name: click
description: Clicks an element on the current page, located by a CSS selector, waiting for it to become visible and ensuring it is clickable.

selector.description: CSS selector for the element to click.

name: fill
description: Fills an input field, textarea, or other editable element located by a CSS selector with a specified value, waiting for it to become visible and editable.

selector.description: A CSS selector for the input element to fill.

value.description: The value to enter into the input field.

name: navigate
description: Navigates to a specified URL in a new browser context, validating the URL format and loading the page.

url.description: The URL to navigate to; must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.

launch_options.description: Browser launch configuration options, including headless mode, viewport size, and user agent settings.

allow_dangerous.description: A boolean indicating whether to allow navigation to potentially unsafe URLs; defaults to `False` for security.

name: screenshot
description: Takes a screenshot of the current page or a specific element identified by a CSS selector, named by `name`, with customizable dimensions defaulting to 800x600 pixels.

selector.description: CSS selector for element to screenshot.

height.description: The height of the screenshot in pixels, defaulting to 600.

name: select_option
description: Selects an option in a `<select>` dropdown element located by a CSS selector, matching the option by its value attribute or text content, after waiting for visibility.

selector.description: A CSS selector for the target select (dropdown) element.

value.description: The value or text of the option to select, matching its `value` attribute or text content.
